subject: Paralympic Games
Olympic Games
Handicapped
Discrimination
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court has denied an appeal in to a ruling by a lower court that the U.S.O.C. has the legal discretion to finance able-bodied and disabled athletes differently.
snippet: The Supreme Court has denied an appeal in to a ruling by a lower court that the U.S.O.C. has the legal discretion to finance able-bodied and disabled athletes differently.
